channel.description: Recent content in Reference on DevDocs Navigation Menu Test

item.title: APIs
item.description: The Okta APIs Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: This is a short summary redirect pointing the developer to the new Redocly site where all API related material is located Why is this here?: - Internal workshop session: Session 1 - Team 2 chose the Okta APIs group. Internal workshop session: Session 2 - Team 1 chose the APIs group.

item.title: SDKs
item.description: SDKs Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Describe and list all supported SDKs provided by Okta. Does not go into specific use cases. Candidate for a separate workshop. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - See Existing content link for more details. We might need a new content type for this style of doc cc @Dan Maharry @Anne Juan Links to original docs: See this doc for the overall structure and content: New Code | SDK Libraries Page Version 2: https://docs.

item.title: Inline Hooks
item.description: Okta Inline Hooks Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Description: Will be hosted in Redocly. This is the overview of the section containing sample JSON content to and from each type of inline hook. Changes to be made: This document is currently dynamically generated, but it should be a written piece fo content that pulls in all the common introduction text from the reference documents underneath it, so those docs can just be reference material rather than having to be an introduction to hooks and then a specific type of hook first.

item.title: Velocity template language
item.description: Velocity template language Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: Doc content is pulled from several docs: Customize email notifications: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/custom-email/main/ Velocity template language (help docs): https://help.okta.com/en-us/content/topics/settings/velocity-variables.htm Structure type: Reference Content type: Reference lookup Reference lookups consist mostly of a series of tables or lists where users can look up facts or definitions, interspersed with short explanatory texts that give those tables the correct context.

item.title: Okta expression language
item.description: Okta expression language Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: At the moment, there are two documents. The main one covers the “legacy” Okta expression language and the secondary one covers it in Identity Engine. Suggest that these documents are role-reversed so that the main doc covers all the support for IDX and the secondary doc covers the diffs between it and Classic Engine. Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer

item.title: Roles, resources, and permissions
item.description: Manage access to Org objects with role assignments Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: Make this guide into a reference guide: Role assignment: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/role-assignment/ Structure type: Task Content type: Integration guide An integration guide or coding guide illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code. It is similar to a how-to but the focus is more technical and geared towards developers integrating an SDK, API, or another library into their applications.

item.title: Dictionary
item.description: Terminology dictionary Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Structure type: Reference Content type: Glossary A Glossary is a list of often difficult or specialized words and acronyms with their definitions, in this case specific to IAM and Okta topics and products. For example: Flare Glossary Okta Dictionary
